meanings.definition: Make a short, sharp, metallic sound.
meanings.sent1: The coins plinks as they fall into the piggy bank.
meanings.sent2: I heard the rain plinks on the window pane.
meanings.sent3: The tiny robot plinks as it moves around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter plinks like a melody in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The old typewriter plinks nostalgically as she types.

meanings.sent1: The plinks of the wind chimes filled the garden.
meanings.sent2: I love the plinks of the keys on the piano.
meanings.sent3: The plinks of the falling tools made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The plinks of the coins hitting the floor echoed in the room.
meanings.sent5: The plinks of the metal gate opening signaled their arrival.
